summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 KEYSTONE MONTANA HIGH COUNTRY RV EQUIPPED WITH GOODYEAR MARATHON TIRES, TIRE SIZE ST235/80/16, DOT NUMBER UNKNOWN. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE REAR PASSENGER TIRE TREAD BELT WAS SEVERELY WARPED. THE REAR DRIVER SIDE TIRE ALSO EXPLODED ON A SEPARATE OCCASION. BOTH TIRES WERE REPLACED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT A TOTAL OF FIVE TIRES WERE REPLACED DUE TO BEING DEFECTIVE. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN.
